title: Chapter 2849 - Chapter 2849: Chapter 2848-Godking Dies
body:
Chapter 2849 - Chapter 2849: Chapter 2848-Godking Dies

Chapter 2849: Chapter 2848-Godking dies

At this moment, somewhere in the first tribe, the ten tribe leaders had gathered. They had already set up a large array.

All of a sudden, the ten of them looked in the direction of the forsaken land, and their faces were filled with ecstasy.

he succeeded. Lu Ming succeeded.

“Hahaha, the ancestor’s soul has come out.”

the ancient ancestor sealed the soul of the ancestor in order to save our clan when we were in danger. Now, it has finally appeared.

The ten clan patriarchs were all overjoyed. At the same time, they were also secretly rejoicing.

The ancient God’s soul was sealed by the Almighties of the ancient God’s descendants to prevent the ancient God clan from facing a great calamity in the future.

However, the talents of the ancient God clan had withered up until now. No one could break the seal. If not for Lu Ming, they would not have been able to release the soul of the ancient God even if they had it.

BOOM! BOOM!

The soul of the ancient God stepped on the ground. With every step, the ground rumbled as he walked out.

This also alarmed the people of the ancient gods tribe.

what’s going on? why is there such a violent tremor coming from the depths of the tribe? ”

“Could it be that something has happened in the depths of the tribe?”

Many of the descendants of the ancient gods started to panic.

don’t worry. These are the ancient God souls released by the patriarchs to deal with the enemies. Don’t worry.

With a senior figure consoling everyone, everyone felt at ease.

In the forsaken land, Lu Ming watched as the ancient God’s soul slowly left. He was just about to follow it to check out the situation.

“I’ll eat, I want to eat …”

QiuQiu cried out and flew out. It grabbed a piece of bronze that had been shattered by the bronze altar and began to gobble it up.

Crack … Crack …

QiuQiu ate with great relish, and very quickly, QiuQiu finished eating a piece of bronze. Then, it rushed to another piece and started eating.

“This round ball is really lucky. This bronze is not inferior to the bronze from the bronze door. After he has digested it, he will probably have a great improvement.”

Bone said with envy.

Lu Ming was also overjoyed. He waited there with peace of mind.

As for the ancient God Soul, step by step, it was not far from the first tribe.

“Great formation, activate!”

The ten clan patriarchs started to activate the formation at the same time. The formation gave off endless light and finally condensed into an ancient God’s shadow. This ancient God’s shadow turned into a rainbow light and flew towards the ancient God’s soul. In the end, it entered the glabella of the ancient God’s soul and disappeared.

“Ancient God Soul, kill!”

The first tribe’s master shouted. They took control of the formation, and then the ancient God’s soul rose into the air and stepped out of the first tribe.

“That is … Ancient God?”

The descendants of the ancient God clan were all shocked. They watched as the ancient God’s soul flew out of the first tribe and charged toward the Army of monsters and demons.

“What’s that?”

The monster demon clan and the outsiders were all shocked.

Roar!

The ancient God’s soul roared, shaking heaven and earth. The mountains crumbled under the roar.

BOOM!

Then, the soul of the ancient God made its move and slapped at the troops of the monster race and demon race.

The palm of the soul of the ancient God was so huge that it could smash tens of thousands of demons into meat paste.

“Ancient God’s soul, it’s the ancient God’s soul, damn it!”

A Demon King roared.

“So what if you’re an ancient God? I’ll kill him.”

A Tiger-shaped Demon King with a huge body stood up like a mountain. It stared at the soul of the ancient God with a ferocious look.

Buzzzzzz!

In the next moment, the Tiger-shaped demonic Devil King pounced directly at the ancient God’s soul, bringing with it endless gales as it attacked the ancient God’s soul.

This Demon King was extremely fierce and wanted to tear the soul of the ancient God into pieces.

Even though his body wasn’t as tall as the knees of the ancient God Soul, he was still very arrogant.

“Kill!”

die! the ancient God’s soul shouted coldly and pressed his palm down.

This palm broke through all of the Tiger-shaped demonic King’s attacks. It was like pressing a Toad onto the ground, pinning the Tiger-shaped demonic King to the ground.

Boom! Boom! Boom!

The ground exploded, creating a huge crater. Countless demons and devils were affected and died.

“Ah!”

The Tiger-shaped demonic King let out a blood-curdling screech as it spat out a large mouthful of blood. It had been severely injured in an instant.

At this moment, countless demons, fiend Kings, and even the godkings of the Qin heaven star region were all shocked.

The demonic Devil King was a Divine King expert, but he was suppressed just like that.

“Quick, come and save me, save me!”

The Tiger-shaped demonic King roared in fear.

“Kill!”

die! the ancient God Soul shouted as it grabbed the Tiger-shaped demonic Devil King with both hands. With a powerful pull, it tore the Tiger-shaped demonic Devil King into two. The terrifying power even annihilated the soul of the tiger-shaped demonic Devil King.

He was dead!

A Demon King was killed just like that.

Countless demons and Devil Kings, as well as the experts of the Qin heaven star region, were all incomparably shocked.

Roar!

The ancient God’s soul roared and stepped forward. He clenched his fists and punched out continuously, blasting a large number of demons into pieces.

“Run, quickly run!”

Countless demons and devils fled frantically.

“Want to escape? kill, kill, kill!”

In the first tribe, the ten tribe leaders shouted in unison. They controlled the ancient God’s soul and charged towards the demons and Devil Kings, as well as the godkings of the Qin heaven star region.

The soul of an ancient God was too powerful. It had boundless strength and could destroy the heavens and earth.

With a punch, he killed a Demon King in the air.

“Run, run …”

With that, the demonic Devil King and the godkings of the Qin heaven star region were all terrified as they fled for their lives.

As for the ancient God Soul, it abandoned the ordinary fiends and focused on The Fiend Kings and the godkings of the Qin heaven star system.

Bang! Bang!

The soul of an ancient God could kill a Godking with a single punch. With two consecutive punches, another two demons were killed. It then targeted a Godking from the Qin heaven Galaxy and chased after him.

“No, no…”

This Godking was the Godking from the unique devil Academy. At this moment, he was extremely frightened and was fleeing for his life. However, how could his speed be compared to that of an ancient God’s soul?

The soul of the ancient God caught up with him in a few steps and punched out with both fists.

Bang! Bang!

The Godking of the unique devil Academy was smashed into the ground by the two punches of the soul of the ancient God. He spat out a large mouthful of blood, and his body almost cracked.

It had to be said that the godkings from the Qin heaven Galaxy were all extremely powerful. The other demons were killed by the ancient God’s soul with a single punch, but the Godking from the unique devil Academy was still alive after being hit by two punches.

However, he was also seriously injured and dying.

“Save me, save me!”

The Godking of the unique devil Academy let out a miserable shriek and wanted to call for others to save him.

However, the others were all running for their lives, so how could they care about him?

Bang!

Then, the soul of the ancient God took a step forward and stepped on the body of the Godking of the unique devil Academy. This time, he was directly trampled into a pulp of flesh and couldn’t be more dead.

Then, the ancient God Soul continued to pursue the other experts.

The next one was the God King of the indestructible sword sect.

This person was also extremely powerful. Unfortunately, he did not manage to escape and was killed by the ancient God’s soul. He followed in the footsteps of the Godking of the unique devil Academy.
